recipes.title: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup flour
2 tbsp sugar
1 egg
1 cup milk
recipes.instructions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Heat a non-stick pan.
Pour batter, cook until golden.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients:
Spaghetti
Eggs
Pancetta
Parmesan cheese
Black pepper
recipes.instructions:
Boil pasta.
Cook pancetta.
Mix eggs + cheese.
Combine everything.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Add wet ingredients.
Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Brownie Milkshake
recipes.ingredients:
Ice cream
Milk
Brownie chunks
Chocolate syrup
recipes.instructions:
Blend all ingredients.
Top with extra brownie pieces.

recipes.title: Cinnamon Rolls
recipes.ingredients:
Flour, Sugar, Yeast, Milk
Butter, Cinnamon, Brown Sugar
Cream Cheese, Powdered Sugar
recipes.instructions:
Prepare dough and let rise.
Roll out and add filling.
Cut rolls and bake at 180°C.
Top with frosting.

recipes.title: Garlic Butter Chicken
recipes.ingredients:
4 chicken breasts
3 tbsp butter
4 garlic cloves
Paprika, Salt, Pepper
recipes.instructions:
Season chicken.
Sauté garlic in butter.
Cook chicken until golden.
Simmer and serve.
